        Parameters:
        idList: - list of IDs from conceptNet
        Returns:
        entries: synsets created based on the conceptNet synset relation for a specific cnid

      • getCNRelations

        public java.util.Set<ConceptNetEntry> getCNRelations(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> cnid,
                                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> unwantedRelations)
        Get all the relations of a specific ConceptNet id
        Parameters:
        cnid: - input ID of ConceptNet
        unwantedRelations: - list of relations we wish to exclude from the final DB
        Returns:
        relations: returns the source and target IDs and their relation as well as the relation weight and surfaceText

      • getTermsByLanguage

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> getTermsByLanguage(java.util.Set<TermEntry> entries)
        Auxiliary method to return only the language and words of a specific synset from a terminological synset to facilitate the multilingual comparison of sysnets
        Parameters:
        entries: - individual rows from the DB that contain the ID, word, and metadata
        Returns:
        termsByLanguage: returns a hash map with all languages and their associated words for a given synset ID

      • getPOS

        public java.lang.String getPOS(java.lang.String cnid)
        Extracts the part-of-speech information contained in the conceptNet id
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        pos: part of speech tag from the input id

      • checkPOS

        public java.lang.String checkPOS(java.lang.String cnid,
                                 java.lang.String cnid2,
                                 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> idList)
        Checks if any other similar ids or relation targets can be utilized to obtain pos information for a specific conceptNet id
        Parameters:
        cnid: - conceptNet id that has no pos information
        cnid2: - target conceptNet id that has a relation to cnid
        idList: - all IDs that have been retrieved
        Returns:
        pos: returns the id with a pos tag if it could be obtained
